job_descriptions.title: Agentic AI Intern
job_descriptions.description: We offer a competitive salary and benefits package, as well as opportunities for professional growth and development. Our team is diverse and dynamic, and we are committed to fostering a culture of inclusion and respect. We believe in giving our team members the autonomy to take ownership of their work, and to pursue their passions and interests. If you are a motivated and talented individual with a passion for AI and machine learning, we encourage you to apply for this exciting opportunity.
required_skills: Machine learning frameworks such as TensorFlow or PyTorch
Deep learning architectures such as CNNs or RNNs
Natural language processing techniques such as sentiment analysis or text classification
Computer vision techniques such as object detection or image segmentation
Cloud-based platforms such as AWS or Azure
Collaboration tools such as Git or Jupyter Notebook
Data visualization tools such as Matplotlib or Seaborn
responsibilities: Collaborating with cross-functional teams to design, develop, and deploy AI-powered solutions
Conducting research and analysis to identify areas of opportunity for AI-driven innovation
Developing and refining AI models using machine learning frameworks such as TensorFlow or PyTorch
Evaluating and refining AI models using techniques such as hyperparameter tuning and model evaluation
Presenting findings and results to senior leadership and other stakeholders
Staying up-to-date with the latest developments in the field of AI and machine learning
Collaborating with other teams, including data science, product, and engineering, to identify areas of opportunity for AI-driven innovation
qualifications: Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Mathematics, or related field
Strong programming skills in languages such as Python or Java
Experience with machine learning frameworks such as TensorFlow or PyTorch
Knowledge of deep learning architectures such as CNNs or RNNs
Experience with data preprocessing and feature engineering
nice_to_have: Experience with cloud-based platforms such as AWS or Azure
Knowledge of containerization tools such as Docker
Experience with agile development methodologies such as Scrum or Kanban
Knowledge of data visualization tools such as Matplotlib or Seaborn
Experience with collaboration tools such as Git or Jupyter Notebook
